level.heading: Longtime resident businesses.
level.text: A business enterprise shall be eligible for certification as a longtime resident business if it meets the definition of longtime resident business pursuant to ยง 2-218.02.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2336 of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-33
level.text: For Law 16-33, see notes following ยง 2-218.01.
